function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited studies quantifying the effect of opening windows on the air change rate in homes","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the impact of window opening on air change rates in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conducting more comprehensive studies to quantify the effect of window opening on air change rates","Technologies":"Real-time monitors to measure air change rates, tracer gas (SF6) to quantify air change rates","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"HVAC system using 100% recirculated air with no fresh air intake","Impact":"Limited ventilation and fresh air supply in the home","Mitigation":"Installation of a ventilation system to introduce fresh air into the home","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air exchange units","People":"Homeowners, building maintenance professionals","Owner":"Homeowners, building management companies"}]}
